title: Language - Culture - Cognition Lab
description: The Language – Culture – Cognition Lab is an international transdisciplinary research hub based at the Austrian Academy of Sciences. It brings together researchers and research teams engaged in analyses of the interrelation of language and culture, as well as cognitive underpinnings of social and cultural phenomena, both past and present.
